Package fb.rt.select

This package contains IEC 61499 function block types for Boolean selection and 1-of-n multiplexing functions.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
FB_MUX_ANY The abstract superclass for IEC 61131-3 4-input multiplexers
FB_SELECT The abstract superclass for binary selection functions with FB_SELECT.IN0, IN1 and FB_SELECT.G inputs.
 

Package fb.rt.select Description

This package contains IEC 61499 function block types for Boolean selection and 1-of-n multiplexing functions. Only the documentation for the abstract superclasses of these functions is given here. Documentation of the concrete subclasses is included with their XML source files, which can be viewed with the FBEditor provided with the Function Block Development Kit (FBDK).
